column5: Anyone know of the ice and snow condition of this area on lake of bays?

Hi Paul. Still 12+ inches of blue ice on bay however shoreline is iffy. Barbara's cousin is doing some construction on Bigwin and he goes across daily on ATV. His is sending some pics will post when they arrive.
Still good a little up the road from Baysville, about 16`` where I was.  ATV`s and sleds out and about.  There is about 5 inches of fresh snow.
